articles.author: Emilia David
articles.title: UK Supreme Court rules AI is not an inventor - The Verge
articles.description: The court denied Stephen Thaler’s request to name the AI system DABUS as an inventor, following a similar decision made by the US Patent and Trademark Office.
articles.content:
UK Supreme Court rules AI is not an inventor
UK Supreme Court rules AI is not an inventor
 / The ruling follows a similar decision denying patent registrations naming AI as creators.

articles.title: Minute-scale oscillatory sequences in medial entorhinal cortex - Nature.com
articles.description: Neural population activity in the medial entorhinal cortex of mice can be organized into ultraslow oscillatory sequences, with periods extending up to the minute range.
